text: Yeroo mallattoon wahii isaanitti dhuftes "hanga fakkaataan waan ergamoonni Rabbii kennamanii nuuf kennamutti hin amannu" jedhuRabbiin ergaa Isaa eessa akka kaayu akkaan beekaWarra badii hojjatan waan isaan dhara karoorsaa turaniif Rabbiin biratti xiqqeenyaafi adabbii cimaa taâ€™etu (isaan) tuqa
